channel.title: Projects on Luke Holman
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Luke Holman

item.title: Queen pheromones
item.description: Research on the identity, mode of action, and evolution of social insect queen pheromones

item.title: Science about science
item.description: Research about science itself: research practice, bias, reproducibility, and culture. Mostly text mining.

item.title: Sexual selection
item.description: Population genetic consequences of sexual selection, honest signalling, sperm biology, etc.

item.title: Gene drives
item.description: Population genetics of natural and synthetic gene drives

item.title: Intralocus sexual conflict
item.description: The causes, consequences, and genetic basis of the maladaptation that arises when males and females share a genome.

item.title: Evolution in social insects
item.description: Question-driven research on the evolution and genetics of ants and bees

item.title: The gender gap in science
item.description: Using text mining to help redress gender inequality in the STEM workforce.

item.title: Sperm
item.description: Sperm competition, and evolution of sperm morphology
